Name: Xitou
Alliance: Changshan sishê (Changshan four shê ritual alliance)
Surname_Groups: The main surnames are the Zeng 曾, the Yang 杨 and the Weng翁. Minor surnames include the Chen 陈 and the Ke 柯. Each year six Fushou 福首 are selected in rotation based on age.
Village_Temples: 1) Xixi zushê 溪西祖社 is dedicated to Zunzhu mingwang 尊主明王 and Houtu furen 后土夫人. The secondary gods are Lisan furen 李三夫人 and Zhanggong shengjun 张公圣君. 2) Chengbentang 承本堂 is dedicated to Sanyi jiaozhu 三一教主.

Rituals.Yuanxiao processions: On 1/13 the gods of the Xixi zushê 溪西祖社 are taken to each household to xingdao 行道. In the evening there is a lantern procession around the village boundaries. Daoist ritual masters conduct rites in the temple. On 1/28–29, Toufu 头福 is celebrated and Lisan furen 李三夫人 is taken on a procession around the entire village. In the evening, palm leaf sedan chairs are raced over bonfires, opera is performed, and Daoist rites are conducted.
Rituals.Birthday celebrations of the gods: 3/18: the celebration of Lisan furen 李三夫人 is held. 8/15: the celebration of Zhanggong shengjun 张公圣君 is held. 10/16: the celebration of Zunzhu mingwang 尊主明王 and Houtu furen 后 土夫人 is held. On all these occasions, opera is performed and Daoist rites are carried out.
